name: Additive hypertension risk with multiple BP-raising drugs
actions: Monitor blood pressure and symptoms of hypertension.
Assess baseline cardiovascular risk and concomitant pressors.
Consider dose reduction or alternative therapy if BP increases.

rationale: Both drugs can increase blood pressure.
Combined effects can increase risk of symptomatic hypertension.
